channel.title: Playing RuneScape legit?
channel.description:
How...
Money making 300k a hour, unless you PvM and PvM is impossible unless you're high level. OR have good gear.... Like if you don't gamble4bank it takes so long to achieve something a gambler could get in 5 minutes, you know? If I knew something at least 1m a hour thats not over produced swarmed by bots.. I would do it... But I don't know what to do anymore, I got cleaned out of my small bank on RS cuz I tried my stradegy of YOLO. But, I still have my D-Pick...
So the question is
Is it even possible to make a good earning playing RS "legit" anymore?

item.title: Playing RuneScape legit?
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“xxlukexx, post:38, topic:470889”]You guys misread what I said… hint: And.[/quote]Oh now I see what you meant

Well I play legit and I have plenty of money in-game. It takes work to get started and usually the earning of it is fun.

Read full topic

kickingjamie:

item.title: Playing RuneScape legit?
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:25, topic:470889”][quote author=Kidpaparoach link=topic=588420.msg4197574#msg4197574 date=1357742541]

Get 200m.
Get 99 Construction.
Host house parties.
I see house party hosters (G alter 2 incense burners), make 10-30m an hour.
Donations baby.

If 99 con + house costs 200m, you’re doin it bad.

or doing it the fast way
?

Opportunity cost. Mahogany planks will run you near 200m just for the skill, not even including the house.

Believe it or not but 200m isn’t that big of a deal once you make enough gp per hour.
Doing it bad? Or not wasting time doing trivial things you don’t like doing on a game you play for fun.
[/quote]

Fun is relative to the item being done. Some people enjoy achievement versus only the end result, hence the difference between people who play legit and those who bot.[/quote]
So even according to your own logic your original point isn’t valid all the time.
More higher levels go for 99 con than ‘newbies’ so they generally have a lot more money meaning that their is a higher likelyhood it isn’t that big of a deal.

Read full topic

Get 200m.
Get 99 Construction.
Host house parties.
I see house party hosters (G alter 2 incense burners), make 10-30m an hour.
Donations baby.

If 99 con + house costs 200m, you’re doin it bad.

or doing it the fast way
?

Opportunity cost. Mahogany planks will run you near 200m just for the skill, not even including the house.
[/quote]
Believe it or not but 200m isn’t that big of a deal once you make enough gp per hour.
Doing it bad? Or not wasting time doing trivial things you don’t like doing on a game you play for fun.[/quote]

Fun is relative to the item being done. Some people enjoy achievement versus only the end result, hence the difference between people who play legit and those who bot.
